body: Perf was the main reason I kept this as C++. I'm also not sure we expose enough of the API to be able to fully re-implement this in Python. (For example, I'm not sure we expose `set_name`)
body_html: Perf was the main reason I kept this as C++. I'm also not sure we expose enough of the API to be able to fully re-implement this in Python. (For example, I'm not sure we expose set_name)
body_text: Perf was the main reason I kept this as C++. I'm also not sure we expose enough of the API to be able to fully re-implement this in Python. (For example, I'm not sure we expose set_name)
